programme.title: Death Note: Execution

programme.sub-title: The Man Possessed by an Evil Spirit

programme.title: Raiga comes back to life, only to see Ranmaru lying deathly still on the ground.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Despite his injuries, Lee keeps on fighting desperately. But the tornado that envelopes Raigas attack takes the form of a dragon, and Lee is swallowed up by it.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto is chosen to lead Konohamaru, Moegi and Udon in a survival training exercise. Their destination is the Stone Face of Warudakumi at the top of Mt. Takurami
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tsunade orders Naruto, Hinata, Kiba and Akamaru on a mission to capture the thief Gosunkugi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others tend to an injured Sazanami. As Sazanami tells it, he had once been a swordsmith in a peaceful town and was framed for a murder committed by Gosunkugi.

programme.title: While Guy and Lee are away, two impostors dressed like them sneak into Hidden Leaf Village.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Land of Birds is in turmoil due to a specter known as the Cursed Warrior, which is believed to be the ghost of Lord Owashi, the previous feudal lord who died suddenly.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Moso, the late feudal lords counselor, and Komei, the chief strategist, are at odds with each other. Neji begins to think that the Cursed Warrior is part of a plot
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Komei is controlling the Cursed Warrior. Moso thwarts Komei's ambitions. The Leaf team feels uneasy about his motives. Neji doesn't want to get involved, but Naruto is defiant. Gamakichi and Gamatatsu are summoned to investigate
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tenten and Neji have no choice but to listen to Kakashi. He senses that their being followed. Komei has been declared a criminal and is to be executed. The Cursed Warrior appears and snatches Komei away.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sagi swears to punish Moso himself. Naruto is reminded of Sasuke when he sees Sagi. Neither words nor Naruto's attempts to stop him can deter Sagi from his chosen path of revenge.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: At Moso's mansion, a battle takes place between the Wandering Ninja and a Leaf Ninja. With Chishima's help, Naruto is freed from Moso's genjutsu. Moso then reveals his true form as the leader of the Wandering ninja, Hoki!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Choji and Naruto are craving Ichiraku's special ramen only to find out that they find the shop closed! Teuchi reveals that his daughter has been kidnapped by Ryonin, aka the Ninja Chefs, who is after his secret recipes!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Demon of the Ocean is wreaking havoc in the Land of the Sea. Anko leads a team consisting of Naruto, Ino, and Shino. It turns out Anko has an unexpected history with the Land of the Sea.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Unable to find Naruto, Anko meets with officials from the Land of the Sea. The ship carrying government funds that they were supposed to guard sets sail the next day!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: As soon as she awakens, Anko begins to remember Demon Island, a place once visited with her former sensei, Orochimaru. Anko reveals the truth behind the disappearances and the secret behind Isaribi's body.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Gangs Of New York, (2003, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's epic film set in mid-19th century Lower Manhattan tells the story of a young Irish immigrant (Leonardo DiCaprio) seeking revenge against the rival gang leader who killed his father.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Crime)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin', (2005, Musical)
programme.desc: Following a near-fatal gun battle, Marcus recalls his journey from orphaned street kid from the Bronx to making his mark in the drug trade to teaming up with a fellow ex-con (Terrence Howard) for his shot at becoming a successful rap artist.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York, (2003, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's epic film set in mid-19th century Lower Manhattan tells the story of a young Irish immigrant (Leonardo DiCaprio) seeking revenge against the rival gang leader who killed his father.

programme.title: Thunderheart, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Val Kilmer, Sam Shepard and Graham Greene star in this murder mystery filled with style and suspense. Kilmer stars as Ray Levoi, a hotshot FBI agent who's thrust into a strange new world when he is sent to solve a murder on an Indian reservation.

programme.title: Colors, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: As members of the Los Angeles Police Department's elite anti-gang unit, a veteran cop and his new partner are called in to assist with the crackdown against the mounting gang violence in the barrios and slums of East Los Angeles.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Crime)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: Colonel Terry Childers is a patriot and war hero. But when a peacekeeping mission he leads in Yemen goes terribly wrong, he finds himself facing a court-martial.

programme.title: The Kill Room, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: Colonel Terry Childers is a patriot and war hero. But when a peacekeeping mission he leads in Yemen goes terribly wrong, he finds himself facing a court-martial.

programme.title: The Kill Room, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.title: Glengarry Glen Ross, (1992, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: A group of Chicago real-estate salesmen and con artists live on the edge.

programme.title: Heist, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A jewel thief's nephew is sent along on a heist to ensure a longtime partner in crime stays honest about the division of the loot.

programme.title: Donnie Brasco, (1997, Crime)
programme.desc: Posing as jewel broker Donnie Brasco, FBI agent Joseph D. Pistone (Johnny Depp) is granted entrance into the violent mob family of aging hit man Lefty Ruggiero (Al Pacino).

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Tom is a young man who believes it's better to be a fake somebody than a real nobody. Finally, A wealthy American shipbuilder hires Tom to travel to Italy to bring back his playboy son.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ace Ventura Pet Detective is on the case to find the Miami Dolphins' missing mascot and quarterback Dan Marino. He goes eye to eye with sharks, stakes out the Miami Dolphins and woos and wows the ladies. He always gets his man...or beast.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Africa's the place where Ace is on the case, setting out to rescue an animal he loathes - a bat! If you're ready to laugh like a pack of hyenas, if you want more fun than an industrial-sized barrel of monkeys, you'll know what to do. Heed the call.

programme.title: The Cable Guy, (1996, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: Out-of-control comedy features Jim Carrey at his hilarious best as a hard-wired cable installer just looking for a friend. Matthew Broderick co-stars.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike and Carol have just one week to come up with $20,000 in back taxes, or theyll lose their house to a neighbor. Even worse, Marcia gets a swollen nose on date night, Cindys addicted to tattling, and Jans hearing a psychotic inner voice.

programme.title: Blankman, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: In Living Color's favorite team of Damon Wayans and David Alan Grier joins Robin Givens, Jon Polito and Jason Alexander in this hilarious crime-fighting comedy about two slapstick heroes who triumph over evil... more or less. Rated PG-13

programme.title: Idle Hands, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: The devil will find work for idle hands to do, but what happens when he chooses the laziest teen slacker in the world to do his dirty work? Anton Tobias is a couch potato burn-out who can't control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand. Rated: R

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike and Carol have just one week to come up with $20,000 in back taxes, or theyll lose their house to a neighbor. Even worse, Marcia gets a swollen nose on date night, Cindys addicted to tattling, and Jans hearing a psychotic inner voice.

programme.title: Brannigan, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: John Wayne stars as Chicago Police Lieutenant Jim Brannigan and Richard Attenborough co-stars as British policeman Cmdr. Swann in this action-comedy. Brannigan teams up in the U.K. with Cmdr Swann to escort a crime boss back to the U.S.

programme.title: Convoy, (1978, Thriller)
programme.desc: Feuding with Sheriff Lyle Wallace (Ernest Borgnine), Martin Penwald (Kris Kristofferson) unites scores of his fellow-drivers via Citizen Band radio into a mile-long convoy which, powered by pent-up resentments, rolls along the Arizona highways.

programme.title: Marathon Man, (1976, Thriller)
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman plays the likable graduate student and marathon runner of the title, unwillingly trapped in a killing game of intrigue involving a Nazi fugitive, Christian Szell.

programme.title: 3 Days of the Condor, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: A mild-mannered CIA researcher, paid to read books, returns from lunch to find all of his co-workers assassinated. "Condor" must find out who did this and get in from the cold before the hitmen get him.

programme.title: Saint Jack, (1979, Crime)
programme.desc: Jack Flowers, an American hustler in early 1970s Singapore, dreams of building a fortune by running a brothel and returning to the States to lead a life of luxury.

programme.title: Gator, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: The Feds want Gator McKlusky (Burt Reynolds) to go undercover to expose a local crime boss and former boyhood pal, Bama McCall. When Gator discovers Bama is involved in extortion, prostitution, and murder, the suspense builds to an explosive climax!

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood and Jeff Bridges lead a strong supporting cast in this offbeat crime caper about a colorful group of bank robbers determined to break into the fortress-like Montana Armored Depository.

programme.title: King Kong, (1976, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
programme.sub-title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Luffy and Usopp battle to a brutal standstill in a heartbreaking duel between men who once called each other family. Can the Straw Hats find the strength to carry on without their sniper?

programme.sub-title: The straw hat pirates are the culprits? The protectors of the city of water!

programme.sub-title: Eternal farewell? Nico robin: the woman who draws darkness!

programme.title: CP9 listens to Icebergs blood to learn the location of the blueprints, Usopp has another run-in with Franky and the remaining Straw Hats plus a new friend race to the rescue!

programme.sub-title: The straw hat pirates annihilated? The menace of the leopard model!

programme.sub-title: The man who is loved even by his ship! Usopp's tears!

programme.sub-title: Franky's past! The day the sea train first ran!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Spandam's scheme! The day the sea train shook!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The end of the legendary man! The day the sea train cried!

programme.sub-title: The truth behind her betrayal! Robin's sorrowful decision!

programme.sub-title: Showdown between cooks! Sanji vs. Ramen kenpo!

programme.title: Zoro faces a fellow master of the blade, Sanji looks to end his fight against a rampaging ramen master, and Franky finally lands a big blow against his CP9 foe!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin breaks out a man named Parker from a Mexican prison in order to steal the treasure Parker had hidden away somewhere.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin, who was once duped by Mamushidayu into stealing diamonds, decides its payback time. Will Lupin get his revenge and finally get his share of diamonds after all?
programme.sub-title: The Man Who Erased His Past

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: An ancient burial mound has been discovered and etched on its walls are ancient mythical creatures with jewel-encrusted eyes. Lupin makes off with the blue dragon's crystal eye and kidnaps the archeologist in charge.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang break into a vault full of uncut diamonds. However, the diamonds suddenly catch on fire, and guess who is being blamed for it!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Swiss Bank's Beirut branch is a mobile branch. Will Lupin manage to pull off the heist of this impenetrable bank and get out safely with Inspector Zenigata on his tail?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are after Taniyama's treasure from an ancient Chinese dynasty. Realizing that Lupin is after his treasure, Taniyama hires a lone assassin named Seiryuu to counter Goemon.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: How could Lupin and his gang refuse when a church priest asks them to retrieve the Dove's Eggs, the church's jewels, for the sake of Spoonland's children?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in New York City to steal a pinball machine made of solid gold. Lupin, Jigen, and Fujiko board a casino cruise ship and discover that they'll need Goemon's Zantetsuken sword to pull off the heist.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were pursuing Flight 107 when Soviet Union planes suddenly shoot it down for wandering into its territory inadvertently.
programme.sub-title: Code Name is The Star of Alaska

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A ring called the Star of Alaska holds a single wheat seed inside it. The seed is a new species of wheat that can grow in minus 40 degrees and the CIA and KGB are determined to get their hands on it.
programme.sub-title: The Star of Alaska Is a Ticket to Hell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon, now that he's won Fujiko's hand in marriage after stealing Marie Antoinette's wedding dress and ring.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A massive amount of gold is being transported in the cover of darkness, but on this rainy night, Lupin is busy being a bartender to a beautiful woman named Sara.
programme.sub-title: The Name of the Cocktail Is Revenge

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal an exquisite painting of a young girl from a Renoir art exhibit. Using the painting as bait, Lupin and his gang plan to steal Ghellon's impressive art collection.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: John Decker, an oil tycoon from Colorado hires Lupin to steal the US presidential limousine and promises to pay 10 million dollars in return.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were scoping out their next target, Macintosh Jewelry, the world's most expensive jewelry store when they end up inadvertently saving a young boy who was being kidnapped.
programme.sub-title: Boy Genius Plays a Dangerous Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang make off with the New York Mafia's secret cash hoard. However, the suitcases were filled with old newspapers and as retribution, the mafia puts a hefty bounty on Lupin's head.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang blow up Fontaubert Bank's underground safe to steal 5 tons worth of gold, but someone has beaten them to it. The thieves are a pair of disguise artists named John and Mary.
programme.sub-title: The Target Beyond the Snowy Field

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Eagle of Helazard from a luxury cruise ship, but Fujiko betrays them at the last moment and makes off with the Eagle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata is even more determined to capture Lupin after an incident with Anne. Lupin and his gang will soon learn that Inspector Zenigata is a force to be reckoned with when he's raging mad.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon has been thrown into prison for a crime he did not commit. He is charged with cutting off the Little Mermaid's arm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious army steals 3 tons worth of gold under Inspector Zenigata's watch. His superiors are convinced Lupin stole the gold and holds Inspector Zenigata responsible.
programme.sub-title: Give the Gold to My Rival

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has lottery fever, or to be specific, has his eyes set on the 50 million dollar jackpot. However, Lupin discovers the lottery is rigged.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have learned a coup d'tat is about to take place in one of the Caribbean countries. Amidst the chaos, they plan to steal the dictator's treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Count Bone and Lord Wave operate the Rondo Insurance Company. The two seem like perfect English gentlemen, but they make their money through dirty tactics.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Queen Gretchen of the Kingdom of Monaka dies from a car accident. As a fan of her years as a Hollywood actress, Lupin mourns her passing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Once a year, jewelers from around the country descend on New York City for a jewelry tradeshow, bringing with them their entire inventory. Combined, the jewelry is said to be worth 20 million dollars.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have Pinkerton's unbreakable safe, minus the key. Lupin breaks into the prison where the late Pinkerton was once held and finds the key hidden in his former prison cell. Now the gang has both the safe and key.
programme.sub-title: A Toast to the Con Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: At Fujiko's request, Lupin steals the Hina dolls given to the US Vice President by the Deputy Prime Minister of Japan. However, the doll heist was a trap laid out by Fujiko and her partner, Barracuda.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon pities the young boy who is afflicted with an incurable illness and swears to retrieve his father's painting for him. Will Goemon be able to keep his promise and will Lupin decipher the painting's hidden secret?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The 100-carat blue diamond, known as Hades' Tear is auctioned off at 1 billion dollars along with its accompanying Hades statue to the KL Foundation of Kingsland. Lupin and Jigen make off with Hades' Tear with ease, but they find out it's only glass.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mexico's richest woman, Madame Tequila owns a black diamond named the Black Pig of Mexico. Realizing that Lupin is after her diamond, Madame Tequila appoints Inspector Zenigata to guard it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Ivanov, the Soviet Union's newest atomic submarine from the Port of Arkhangelsk. Lupin becomes entangled in a fierce tug of war between the KGB and CIA when Fujiko decides to sell it to the highest bidder.

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Hes a composite of some 200 personalities, each and every one a notorious killer. Hes Sid 6.7, a virtual reality creation designed to put L.A. police officers to the test.

programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: The Terminator, (1984, Thriller)
programme.desc: A cyborg is sent from the future to assassinate a young woman who's destined to give birth to a son who will become the key to saving humanity.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: The Terminator, (1984, Thriller)
programme.desc: A cyborg is sent from the future to assassinate a young woman who's destined to give birth to a son who will become the key to saving humanity.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: The Way West, (1967, Western)

programme.title: Man With The Gun, (1955, Western)

programme.title: The Gunfight at Dodge City, (1959, Western)

programme.title: The Unforgiven, (1960, Western)

programme.title: My Pal Trigger, (1946, Action)

programme.desc: When her home is invaded by three armed robbers, a divorced woman and her young daughter hide in their specially designed panic room but end up in a deadly cat-and-mouse game anyway.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button, (2008, Romance)
programme.desc: Brad Pitt and Cate Blanchett star in the adaption of F. Scott Fitzgerald's story about an elderly man who ages backward and the problems that arise when he falls in love with a woman.

programme.title: O Motorista
programme.desc: Neste thriller de ao aterrorizante estrelado por Mark Dacascos e Julie Condra, um pai luta para resgatar sua famlia dos mortos-vivos quando um ataque destri sua residncia fortificada.

programme.title: Risco Absoluto
programme.desc: Liberado aps seis anos preso por um crime que no cometeu, Shane Daniels no demora a se meter novamente em encrenca. Ele testemunha um crime e para salvar uma jovem sequestrada se envolve com a mfia chinesa, russos e policiais corruptos.

programme.title: O Franco-Atirador
programme.desc: Depois de uma longa carreira como matador de aluguel, Martin Terrier pretende se aposentar e passar o resto da vida ao lado de sua amada. Mas ele descobre que est sendo trado por pessoas de sua confiana!

programme.title: Sobreviva a Noite
programme.desc: Um intenso filme de ao, que traz Dolph Lundgren como um agente da Interpol protegendo sua esposa e filha de um criminoso implacvel e seus mercenrios em um vilarejo italiano.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais
programme.desc: Um sdico serial killer sequestra aqueles que so moralmente rebeldes e os fora a fazer escolhas impossveis em um jogo de sobrevivncia assustador.

programme.title: Psicopata Americano II
programme.desc: A histria se passa quase 15 anos aps os acontecimentos de Psicopata Americano, acompanhando a nica sobrevivente de Patrick Bateman. Ela se torna assistente de um professor e comea a desenvolver obsesses assassinas, destruindo quem cruzar seu caminho.

programme.title: Piranha 2
programme.desc: No passado, uma feio geolgica nas profundezas da gua despertou uma pira que estava extinta h milhes de anos. Depois de atacar o lago em uma cidade tranquila, os terrveis animais invadem um parque aqutico no meio da temporada de vero.

programme.title: O Grito 2
programme.desc: Com Amber Tamblyn e Arielle Kebbel. Em Tquio, a irm de uma garota previamente morta por uma maldio maligna acidentalmente infligida a si mesma. Com a ajuda de um jornalista, ela deve aprender como impedi-lo de uma vez por todas.

programme.title: O Grito 3
programme.desc: Dr. Sullivan descobre que os fantasmas de Kayako e Toshio tm como alvo uma nova famlia. Se ela falhar em convencer uma misteriosa mulher japonesa a ajudar a banir os espritos vingativos, todos os envolvidos enfrentaro um destino pior do que a morte.

programme.title: Sobreviva a Noite
programme.desc: Um intenso filme de ao, que traz Dolph Lundgren como um agente da Interpol protegendo sua esposa e filha de um criminoso implacvel e seus mercenrios em um vilarejo italiano.

programme.title: Acima da Lei
programme.desc: Um ex-mafioso que se tornou empresrio e um detetive da polcia devem lutar com um ex-policial sujo que quer levar o assassino de seu filho justia.

programme.title: O Corvo III: A Salvao
programme.desc: Alex Corvis um jovem injustamente condenado cadeira eltrica pelo brutal assassinato de Lauren, sua namorada. Pelo poder mgico do corvo, Corvis retorna do mundo dos mortos para vingar a morte de Lauren e limpar seu nome.

programme.title: Instinto Predador
programme.desc: Frank capturou animais selvagens na selva brasileira, incluindo uma ona branca de 400 libras. Ele a envia no mesmo navio que um assassino preso. O assassino se liberta e liberta os animais.

programme.title: Acima da Lei
programme.desc: Um ex-mafioso que se tornou empresrio e um detetive da polcia devem lutar com um ex-policial sujo que quer levar o assassino de seu filho justia.

programme.title: Matador de Aluguel
programme.desc: Joe um detetive, mas tambm um assassino por encomenda. Quando Chris, um traficante, tem seu estoque roubado pela prpria me, ele resolve contratar os servios de 'Killer Joe' para se livrar da morte usando o dinheiro do seguro de vida de sua me.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: A Evoluo
programme.desc: A saga continua mostrando o incio da antiga disputa entre as duas triboso os Vampiros y Lycans, enquanto a bela herona vampira Selene descobre que foi trada pela sua prpria raa e agora precisa buscar vingana.

programme.title: Tubares de Gelo
programme.desc: Uma nova raa de tubares vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estao de pesquisa do rtico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Fuga do Vulco
programme.desc: Quando um avio comercial fica preso dentro de um crculo de vulces em erupo, os passageiros e a tripulao precisam encontrar uma maneira de sobreviver - sem aterrissar.

programme.title: O Som do Trovo
programme.desc: No ano de 2055, o esporte predileto dos ricos viajar no tempo para caar dinossauros. A diverso tem apenas uma regra: proibido trazer do passado qualquer lembrancinha, viva ou morta, j que isto geraria uma srie de reaes que modificaria o presente

programme.title: Piranha 2
programme.desc: No passado, uma feio geolgica nas profundezas da gua despertou uma pira que estava extinta h milhes de anos. Depois de atacar o lago em uma cidade tranquila, os terrveis animais invadem um parque aqutico no meio da temporada de vero.

programme.title: A Invaso
programme.desc: Depois que sua pequena cidade australiana aniquilada por um ataque areo avassalador, um grupo de civis foge da captura e descobre que agora esto entre os ltimos sobreviventes de uma invaso extraterrestre que engolfou todo o planeta.

programme.title: Os Reis da Rua
programme.desc: Um policial veterano vai contra cultura policial da qual fez parte a sua carreira inteira.

programme.title: O Homem da Mfia
programme.desc: Um assalto a um jogo de pquer ilegal, cujos participantes eram integrantes da mfia, abala o mundo do crime. Um matador profissional contratado para investigar o caso, mas a hesitao de alguns dos participantes coloca a situao fora de controle.

programme.title: Trfico Humano
programme.desc: Traumatizado pela morte de um inocente, Bradley, um assassino de aluguel, se isola da sociedade e vagueia pelas perigosas ruas de um gueto do centro da cidade em busca de sentido para sua vida.

programme.title: Antes Que o Diabo Saiba Que Voc Est Morto
programme.desc: Andy e seu irmo Hank esto com problemas financeiros. Eles organizam um assalto a uma pequena joalheria para para sarem dessa situao de forma rpida e sem causar vtimas. O crime comea a dar errado quando descobrem que a loja pertence aos seus pais.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vtima de suas armadilhas o inspetor de polcia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que so brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: Desejo de Vingana
programme.desc: Quando uma jornalista informada por um agente do FBI que seu marido acaba de ser assassinado, os dois unem foras para desvendar uma rede de enganos chocante e mortal.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China e na Amrica
programme.desc: Jet Li Wong Fei-Hong, heri chins que vai Amrica, salvo por ndios e luta contra a explorao de trabalhadores chineses por um tirano local.

programme.title: Samurai X - O Inferno De Kyoto
programme.desc: Kenshin Himura vai contra o puro mal Makoto Shishio que est tentando derrubar o governo Meiji. O destino do pas est em jogo quando Kenshin Himura pega a espada que ele jurou nunca mais sacar.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caador de Encrenca
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresrio em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: O Drago Invencvel
programme.desc: Um agente da polcia paisana procura vingana contra um sindicato do crime implacvel aps o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: O Matador - Misso Resgate
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele est cuidando sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Combate
